trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is thrown when the file image of a dynamic link library (DLL) or an executable program is invalid.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxx xx x xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx $XXX$ xx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: If the inner parameter is not a null reference, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Xx xxx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xxxxxxxxx xx xxx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx x $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

A message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The full name of the file with the invalid image.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The full name of the file with the invalid image.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: If the inner parameter is not null, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Xx xxx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xxxxxxxxx xx xxx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$$ xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx x $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the name of the file that causes this exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the file with the invalid image, or a null reference if no file name was passed to the constructor for the current instance.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx$ xx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the error message and the name of the file that caused this exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A string containing the error message and the name of the file that caused this exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns the fully qualified name of this exception and possibly the error message, the name of the inner exception, and the stack trace.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx$ xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A string containing the fully qualified name of this exception and possibly the error message, the name of the inner exception, and the stack trace.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx$ xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x
